name: Arrowsong
effect:
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
When you draw a card, add a verse counter.
Remove three verse counters ==> You pay 3 less the next time you strike with this weapon this turn.

name: Bandit's Insignia
effect: On your turn: [Activate] ==> Target opponent puts a card from his hand into his resource row face down and exhausted.
"Did you drop this?" - Oakenclaw

name: Betrayer of Humanity
effect: As an additional cost to play this weapon, destroy a Human or Orc you control.
"The ends always justify the means, especially in war." - Boarguts the Impaler

name: Calamity's Grasp
effect: When this weapon enters play, choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment." You may discard a card of that kind. If you do, destroy target card if it shares that kind.
"They never see it coming." - Gyro of the Ring

name: Cincture of Polarity
effect: Heroes and allies you control have +2 [Health] while you control an even number of heroes and allies.
"Equality is in the eye of the controller." - Loraala the Frigid

name: Cover of Silence
effect: Your hero has Stealth. Opponents can't play cards on your turn.
"Tread softly. We must keep our presence here a secret." - Oakenclaw

name: Cryptfiend's Bite
effect: When you strike with this weapon on an opponent's turn, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Scarab ally tokens into play.
"Even the cruelest weaponry may serve a righteous and just cause." - Justice Blindburn

name: Damnation
effect: Opposing cards everywhere have "Death Rattle: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to itself."
"The end is upon you!" - Kel'Thuzad

name: Dying Curse
effect: 1, [Activate] ==> Destroy target attachment. If you do, its controller draws a card.
"Brazenly you have disregarded powers beyond your understanding." - Gothik the Harvester

name: Envoy of Mortality
effect:
When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.
When your hero deals damage with this weapon, it also deals that much ranged damage to target friendly hero or ally.
"I don't usually like da noise of a rifle, but in dis case, I might make an exception." - The Longeye

name: Faerlina's Madness
effect: On your turn: [Activate], Turn a resrouce you control face down ==> Turn target opposing resource face down.
"You dare challenge the might of the master? This is blasphemy! This is madness!" - Grand Widow Faerlina

name: Footwraps of Vile Deceit
effect: When this armor enters play, target an opposing equipment. You control it while this armor remains under your control.
"Get a grip on yourself, or we are all doomed!" - Martiana the Mindwrench

name: Girdle of Razuvious
effect: When this armor enters play, search your deck for a weapon with cost less than or equal to the number of resourcs you control, put damage on your hero equal to its cost, and put it into play.
"The time for practice is over! Show me what you've learned!" - Instructor Razuvious

name: Gloves of Calculated Risk
effect:
You pay 1 less to play equipment, to a minimum of 1.
Weapons you control have +1 ATK, and other armor you control have +1 [DEF].
When this armor is destroyed, destroy all equipment you control.

name: Icy Blast Amulet
effect: When your hero is dealt damage on an opponent's turn, you may pay 1. If you do, it deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally.
The last remnant of a once-powerful dragon.

name: Last Laugh
effect: When this weapon enters play, target opponent gains control of it until the start of your next turn.
"Bwahahahahahahaha!" - Randolphe Mortimer

name: Plague Igniter
effect: When your hero deals shadow ([Shadow]) damage to a hero, allies in its party have -1 [Health] this turn.
"Only fools and gods would think they can control such an unpredictable force." - Andarius the Damned

name: Riveted Abomination Leggings
effect: Heroes you allies you control have Assault 2 and Conspicuous.
"Who cares if they see us coming? They can't possibly stop us all!" - Justice Blindburn

name: Scourgeborne Battlegear
effect:
At the end of your turn, you may remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
[Activate] ==> Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Ready a Ghoul you control.

name: Signet of Manifested Pain
effect: At the start of your turn, you may put 2 damage on your hero. If you do, put a 2 [Melee] / 2 [Health] ally token into play with the same class and race as your hero.
"I shall reward your courage with an eternity of pain and suffering." - Kel'Thuzad

name: Sinister Revenge
effect:
Your hero has Dual Wield.
When this weapon enters play, put X +1 ATK counters on it, where X is the ATK of another Melee weapon you control.
"Pray for mercy!" - Kel'Thuzad

name: Split Greathammer
effect: If your hero would deal combat damage to a hero with this weapon, it may deal that much divided as you choose among any number of opposing heroes and/or allies instead.
"I have just the right antidote for the Scourge masses." - Tribemother Torra

name: Strong-Handed Ring
effect: Your hero has Assault 5 while you have five or more cards in your hand.
"Knowing your environment is only half the battle. I prefer the other half, where I beat the snot out of you." - Lord Benjamin Tremendouson

name: The Turning Tide
effect: You pay 2 less to play allies while you control fewer allies than an opponent.
"Your shallow victory will not turn the tide against the Lich King!" - Kel'Thuzad

name: The Undeath Carrier
effect: When a non-Undead ally you control is destroyed, put it into play, and it's also an Undead.
"Soon. . .the world will tremble." - Heigan the Unclean

name: Torn Web Wrapping
effect: 1, [Activate] ==> Reveal a random face-down resource you control. If it's a location or quest, turn it face up. Otherwise, put it into its owner's hand.
By look it is as soft as silk, but by touch it is as hard as metal.

name: Urn of Lost Memories
effect: On your turn: [Activate], Destroy an ability or equipment you control with cost X ==> Put target ally with cost X or less from your graveyard into play.
"The long-forgotten memories of the Four Horsemen are contained within." - Andarius the Damned

name: Voice of Reason
effect:
Your hero has Mend 2 for each 5 damage on it.
Your hero has Protector while you control no damaged allies.
"Only the foolish think resoning is for the weak." - Justice Blindburn

name: Wall of Terror
effect: When this armor enters play, put each other ability, ally, and equipment into its owner's hand.
"What do you intend to do when the face of death stares at you? - Kel'Thuzad

name: Widow's Fury
effect: This weapon has +3 ATK if an ally you controlled was destroyed this turn.
"The greatest glory is to die in the master's service!" - Grand Widow Faerlina
